Additional.Features: Students studying the Attestat o Srednem Obrazovami (Certificate of Secondary Education, grade 11) are typically required to complete a foundation course - An average of 4 in the Attestat (with 5 in relevant subjects) is typically required for admission to our foundation courses|International A-levels and International Baccalaureate needs to be specified for NIS 12-year students
